00038     template<typename Tret, typename Tparam> class IfaceMethod : public IIfaceMethod
00039     {
00040     private:
00041         string _name;
00042         bool _static;
00043     public:
00048         IfaceMethod(const string &name) : _name(name), _static(false) {}
00054         IfaceMethod(const string &name, bool stic) : _name(name), _static(stic) {}
00055 
00061         bool HasMatch(const MetaClass &cls) const
00062         {
00063             return cls.HasMethod(_name) && cls.TypeCheck<Tret, Tparam>(_name) && cls.IsStatic(_name)==_static;
00064         }
00065     };

00071     class MetaIface
00072     {
00073     private:
00074         vector<PolyWrapper<IIfaceMethod> > _methods;
00075     public:
00080         void AddMethod(const PolyWrapper<IIfaceMethod> &method)
00081         {
00082             _methods.push_back(method);
00083         }
00089         bool IsMatch(const MetaClass &cls) const
00090         {
00091             foreach(PolyWrapper<IIfaceMethod> m, _methods)
00092             {
00093                 if (!m().HasMatch(cls)) return false;
00094             }
00095             return true;
00096         }
00097     };
